statements: SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25.0
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 60.0 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 70.0 AND precipitation > 0.5
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE wind_speed < 10.0 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT date, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation < 0.1
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT precipitation, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY precipitation DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity > 60;
SELECT temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT city, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT city, date FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT crop_name, quantity FROM CropData WHERE quantity BETWEEN 100 and 500 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT city, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE city = 'San Francisco';
SELECT city, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT city, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE city='New York' LIMIT 5
SELECT crop_name, quantity FROM CropData WHERE harvest_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT city, date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE city='London' AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT crop_name, quantity FROM CropData WHERE quantity > 1000 AND quantity < 5000
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, rainfall FROM rainfall_data ORDER BY rainfall DESC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_data WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT datetime, temperature, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT location, rainfall FROM rainfall_data ORDER BY rainfall DESC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_data WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM weather_data w JOIN rainfall_data r ON w.datetime = r.datetime WHERE w.temperature > 30 AND r.rainfall > 10 ORDER BY w.datetime DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE city='New York' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, city, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM WeatherPatterns ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;
SELECT city, crop_name, recommended_date, recommended_yield FROM CropRecommendations WHERE city='Los Angeles' ORDER BY recommended_date ASC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM CropData WHERE yield > 100 ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT id, city, date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM CropData WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-01' ORDER BY yield DESC;
SELECT city, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM WeatherData GROUP BY city HAVING max_temp > 30;
SELECT pattern_name, LEFT(description, 50) AS short_description FROM WeatherPatterns ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;
SELECT city, crop_name, recommended_date FROM CropRecommendations WHERE recommended_yield > 100 ORDER BY city, recommended_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM location WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2022-06-12';
SELECT farmer_name, crop_name FROM farmer JOIN crop ON farmer.crop_id = crop.crop_id;
SELECT city, country, latitude, longitude FROM location ORDER BY country, city DESC;
SELECT * FROM farmer WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY farmer_name ASC;
SELECT farmer_name, crop_name, yield_per_acre FROM farmer f JOIN crop_yield y ON f.crop_id = y.crop_id ORDER BY yield_per_acre DESC;
SELECT location_id, AVG(temperature), AVG(humidity) FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT city, country, latitude, longitude FROM location WHERE city LIKE 'New%' OR country = 'USA';
SELECT farmer_name, crop_name, yield_per_acre FROM farmer f JOIN crop_yield y ON f.crop_id = y.crop_id WHERE yield_per_acre > 50 ORDER BY yield_per_acre DESC;
